model-value.desc: Model of the component defining current panel name; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

vertical.desc: Use vertical design (tabs one on top of each other rather than one next to the other horizontally)
vertical.desc_cn: 使用垂直设计（选项卡一个接一个，而不是水平排列）

outside-arrows.desc: Reserve space for arrows to place them on each side of the tabs (the arrows fade when inactive)
outside-arrows.desc_cn: 为箭头留出空间，以便将其放置在选项卡的每一侧（箭头在不活动时会褪色）

mobile-arrows.desc: Force display of arrows (if needed) on mobile
mobile-arrows.desc_cn: 在移动设备上强制显示箭头（如果需要）

align.desc: Horizontal alignment the tabs within the tabs container
align.desc_cn: 水平对齐选项卡容器中的选项卡

breakpoint.desc: Breakpoint (in pixels) of tabs container width at which the tabs automatically turn to a justify alignment
breakpoint.desc_cn: 选项卡容器宽度的断点（以像素为单位），选项卡在该断点处自动变为对齐

active-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the text of the active tab
active-color.desc_cn: 作为活动选项卡属性的文本的颜色

active-bg-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the background of the active tab
active-bg-color.desc_cn: 作为活动选项卡属性的背景的颜色

indicator-color.desc: The color to be attributed to the indicator (the underline) of the active tab
indicator-color.desc_cn: 作为活动选项卡属性的指示符（下划线）的颜色

content-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the content wrapper
content-class.desc_cn: 作为内容包装器属性的类的定义

active-class.desc: The class to be set on the active tab

left-icon.desc: The name of an icon to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the left, when the tabs extend past the width of the tabs container
left-icon.desc_cn: 当选项卡超出选项卡容器的宽度时，替换用于向左滚动选项卡的默认箭头的图标名称

right-icon.desc: The name of an icon to replace the default arrow used to scroll through the tabs to the right, when the tabs extend past the width of the tabs container
right-icon.desc_cn: 当选项卡超出选项卡容器的宽度时，替换用于向右滚动选项卡的默认箭头的图标名称

stretch.desc: When used on flexbox parent, tabs will stretch to parent's height
stretch.desc_cn: 在flexbox父级上使用时，选项卡将延伸到父级的高度

shrink.desc: By default, QTabs is set to grow to the available space; However, you can reverse that with this prop; Useful (and required) when placing the component in a QToolbar
shrink.desc_cn: 默认情况下，QTabs设置为增长到可用空间；不过，你可以用这个属性来扭转这种局面；在QToolbar中放置构件时非常有用（并且是必需的）

switch-indicator.desc: Switches the indicator position (on left of tab for vertical mode or above the tab for default horizontal mode)
switch-indicator.desc_cn: 切换指示器位置（垂直模式在选项卡左侧或默认水平模式在选项卡上方）

narrow-indicator.desc: Allows the indicator to be the same width as the tab's content (text or icon), instead of the whole width of the tab
narrow-indicator.desc_cn: 允许指示器与选项卡内容（文本或图标）的宽度相同，而不是选项卡的整个宽度

inline-label.desc: Allows the text to be inline with the icon, should one be used
inline-label.desc_cn: 如果使用图标，则允许文本与图标内联

no-caps.desc: Turns off capitalizing all letters within the tab (which is the default)
no-caps.desc_cn: 关闭选项卡中所有字母的大写（这是默认值）

dense.desc_cn: 紧凑模式，占用更少的空间

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component

update:model-value.desc: Emitted when the component needs to change the model; Is also used by v-model
update:model-value.desc_cn: 当组件需要改变模型数据（model）时触发，也会被 v-model 使用
